creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: drawing in black ink with touches of red and salmon pink on thin paper, mounted onto off white backing sheet; man with bare legs apart, wearing kimono with floral medallion on PL shoulder, with sword held over his head behind his back, with a grimacing expression; gourd-shaped cartouche in URC
medium: Preparatory drawing for a print; ink and color on paper
signed: 一魁斎芳年筆 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi hitsu}
title: Samurai with drawn sword
